Message Body:
Name : Mahietab
Email : Mahietab.morsy@acdimatrading.com
Company : Acdima international trading
Telephone : 01125650023
Product Name : PPG-15 Stearyl Ether
Country : United States


Message : I hope this message finds you well.
I am currently in the process of developing a foam product and am looking for PPG-15 Stearyl Ether as a key ingredient. I would like to inquire about the following:
Availability in Egypt and COA.
I would greatly appreciate your prompt response with pricing, Deliver time, and minimum order quantity (if applicable).
Thank you in advance for your support.

--
This e-mail was sent from a contact form on Matangi (http://www.matangiindustries.com)
